text: The 1921–22 New York F.C. season was the club's first season in the American Soccer League and the inaugural season of the league. The club previously played in the National Association Football League. New York F.C. finished 2nd in the league. ==American Soccer League== {| class="wikitable" style="text- align:center" |- !Date !Opponents !H/A !Result F–A !Scorers !Attendance |- bgcolor="#ffffdd" |18 September 1921 |Harrison S.C. |H |2-2 |Duggan, A.
